rottapeli.domain

Class Cheese

  • java.lang.Object
    • rottapeli.domain.superclasses.Entity
      • rottapeli.domain.superclasses.Positioned
        • rottapeli.domain.Cheese
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Bouncable, Eatable

    public class Cheese
extends Positioned
implements Bouncable, Eatable
    Objective of the game.

    Rat must eat all of the cheese to proceed to the next stage. Cheese causes Balls to bounce off it.

    Author:
    Pavel

    • Method Detail

      • defaultPosition

        public void defaultPosition()
        Places the Entity at a specified location. Must be overriden to be functional.

        Cheese is placed at a random location. It is preferrable to call findNearestFreeSpot() after calling this method.

        Overrides:
        defaultPosition in class Positioned

      • getEaten

        public void getEaten()
        Remove the cheese once it's been eaten.
        Specified by:
        getEaten in interface Eatable

      • draw

        public void draw(Graphics g,
        double offsetX,
        double offsetY,
        double xMultiplier,
        double yMultiplier)
        Contains instructions on how to represent this entity in the GameField.

        Cheese is a green rectangle.

        Overrides:
        draw in class Positioned
        Parameters:
        g - Graphics data.
        offsetX - X position of the drawing field in respect to window's location.
        offsetY - Y position of the drawing field in respect to window's location.
        xMultiplier - Horizontal stretching based on window's width.
        yMultiplier - Vertical stretching based on window's height.
